name: Rage Racing 3D
description:
Tired of Boring drive? Come on, Free your Rage in “Rage Racing”!
Presented by Feamber, A Fantastic title for you.

Mixed of Speed, Skill, and Science, Drive the cars like never before!

***Rage mixed by Racing and Parkour***
Like Parkour? Or Racing games? Enjoy them all in our game, this is the only chance in market.

---------Career mode with Rage-------
Kinds of tasks, Different modes of levels, all you can imagine in a racing game. Collect rare parts to evolve your machines, yes, race like a underground driver.

--------Endless mode beyond endless---------
How many cars you will destroy by your rage, let`s see what you can do.

---------World Rank of Rage---------
You are not the only one, here you can challenge people worldwide. Remember, beat them with rage.

---------Chase and Boss---------
Police are weak? No, in this game, they will chase you with anything they have! Helicopter? Why not!

--------Parts collector, Rage slot!---------
100+ parts to collect!

---------Modify your Machine---------
Upgrade, evolve, and paint your cars, you can win them all with your rage.

---------Slim size, Rich packed---------
With our self-developed engine, you can enjoy the rich gameplay in a slim size!
